name: Rope and Basket Puzzle
description: Using the rope and basket to lower items or navigate the shaft

entries.expectedOutput: The rope drops over the side and comes within ten feet of the floor.
entries.notes: Tying rope to railing in Dome Room

entries.expectedOutput:
Torch Room
This is a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down staircase. Above you is a large dome painted with scenes depicting elvish hacking rites. Up around the edge of the dome (20 feet up) is a wooden railing. In the center of the room there is a white marble pedestal.
